resume: Javier Herrera  is a man in love whose world comes crashing down shortly after his wedding when his wife, María  tells him that she loves someone else. He must start over completely, with no money and no job, and a totally empty apartment. He tries esoteric therapies and even adopts a dog to attract women, but to no avail: Javier only remembers his ex- wife. Enter Julia , a free-spirited young woman willing to be his friend unconditionally, if only Javier could forget Maria.
